005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014/**
015 * Represents a constraint that allows a configurable message.
016 *
017 * @since 2.0.0
018 */
019public interface IConfigurableMessageConstraint extends IConstraint {
020
021  /**
022   * A message to emit when the constraint is violated. Allows embedded Metapath
023   * expressions using the syntax {@code \{ metapath \}}.
024   *
025   * @return the message if defined or {@code null} otherwise
026   */
027  @Nullable
028  String getMessage();
029
030  /**
031   * Generate a violation message using the provided item and dynamic context for
032   * inline Metapath value insertion.
033   *
034   * @param item
035   *          the target Metapath item to use as the focus for Metapath evaluation
036   * @param context
037   *          the dynamic context for Metapath evaluation
038   * @return the message
039   * @throws IllegalStateException
040   *           if a custom message is not defined, which will occur if this method
041   *           is called while {@link #getMessage()} returns {@code null}
042   */
043  @NonNull
044  String generateMessage(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull DynamicContext context);
045}
